mapper.select: SELECT IDX, TITLE, CREA_ID AS ID, USER_NAME AS NAME, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, TO_CHAR(CREA_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD') AS CREA_DTM FROM TB_BOARD WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY IDX DESC
SELECT ID, NAME, AGE, EMAIL FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{userEmail} AND PASSWORD = #{userPassword}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER(SEQ, ID, PASSWORD, NAME, AGE, EMAIL, SEX) VALUES (TB_MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{password}, #{fullname}, TO_NUMBER(#{age}), #{email}, #{gender})
INSERT INTO TB_BOARD(IDX, TITLE, CONTENTS, CREA_DTM, CREA_ID, HIT_CNT, USER_NAME, AGE) VALUES (TB_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, SYSDATE, #{CREA_ID}, 0, #{USER_NAME}, #{AGE})
